Name: Fratelli d'Italia
Review Text: The best pizza i ever taste in Amsterdam. I'm Not pizza lover and not meat eater, but this pizza, the dough is like in Italy. Super fast delivery and levelly people.

Name: Fratelli d'Italia
Review Text: Have always ordered takeaway and have never been disappointed.Arguably the best pizza I have had in Amsterdam in the last seven months!!! Very strongly recommend.

Name: Fratelli d'Italia
Review Text: Fresh. Tasty. Authentic. Eat here or order takeaway. Delicious Italian simple flavours. Top

Name: Fratelli d'Italia
Review Text: Best pizza in Amsterdam. The 2 on 1 is really good!
